targets.expr: sum by (env) (increase(connectivity_particle_send_success_total{env="$env"}[1d]) + ignoring(day_of_week) group_right count_values without() ("day_of_week", day_of_week(timestamp(increase(connectivity_particle_send_success_total{env="$env"}[1d])))))

sum by (env) (increase(connection_pool_received_particles_total{env="$env"}[1d]) + ignoring(day_of_week) group_right count_values without() ("day_of_week", day_of_week(timestamp(increase(connection_pool_received_particles_total{env="$env"}[1d])))))
